message:
Hi, I'm a web backend dev (Linux-Apache-MySql-Php + Zend Framework), web frontend dev (html, css, js, prototype and jquery) and iPhone/iOS developer.
Here my website with my startup, my works, my apps and my linkedin profile www.tugulab.org . 
My current startup is www.challengein.com
My startup partner is a designer (web, iphone, android, etc) designer and UX experience, so she can design me the stuff needed.
If you need my work and experience for your projects ask me.
are you looking for work to do or possibly someone to join you?
@ccarnino Nice to see startup enthusiast like you and you're partner are, we both had a common actually from end to end, relief to see i'm (in fact we are all) not alone in this world
@fauzi It's always cool meet people who share your passion
@ccarnino hey I may need your help to build our app in few months time www.flubit.com
@Adel68 Write to me at carninoclaudio at tugulab.org in the middle of next week. I've some work stuff to finish now, so we can start talking about it ;)
@ccarnino I am a designer and I am looking for a good developer for a stalled Web/iOS  project.
What are your usual hourly rates? And how long do you think you'll take to make an average app, given all specifications (e.g dropbox, instagram)?
@kaishin Sorry but I've not time anymore...
@kaishin Sorry but I've not time anymore...
@Adel68 Flubit looks great! The video is awesome, who made that, yourself or outsourced?
